document_data.mainbody: '''''Ropes of entanglement''''' were [[enchanted]] ropes used to restrain creatures.
document_data.Description: ''Ropes of entanglement'' appeared to be ordinary [[hemp]]en ropes, {{SI|30'|'"|long=yes}} long and weighted between {{SI|3|lb|k|long=yes}} and {{SI|5|lb|k|long=yes}}.

Powers.Creation: ''Ropes of entanglement'' could be created by capable crafters of wondrous items with the use of ''[[animate objects]]'', ''[[animate rope]]'', and ''[[entangle]]'' [[spell]]s.

document_data.Reputation:
Among the [[baatezu]], [[erinyes]] carried ''ropes of entanglement'' to be used in battle.

Deity [[Khurgorbaeyag]], a lieutenant of [[Maglubiyet]], carried a {{SI|30'|'"|long=yes}} [[whip]] enchanted with magics of a ''rope of entanglement'' in his avatar form.
